summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account transactions for the month of December 2018. It includes information about deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and the ending balance of the account. The statement highlights a significant outgoing transfer to Noah Chomsky.

persons.name: Noah Chomsky
persons.context: Noah Chomsky is mentioned as the recipient of a significant outgoing money transfer from the account detailed in the statement.

connections.description: Noah Chomsky is the account holder at Deutsche Bank, as evidenced by the outgoing transfer recorded in the financial statement.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfer
events.description: A significant outgoing money transfer was made from the account to Noah Chomsky.

keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $269,158.65 on December 1, 2018.
An outgoing money transfer of $269,158.65 was made to Noah Chomsky on December 3, 2018.
The ending balance of the account as of December 31, 2018, was $13.27.
Service charges and fees totaled $50.00 for the statement period.
Interest earned on the account for the period was $13.27.
